import {AiOutlineLeft,AiOutlineRight} from "react-icons/ai"; import {FaQuoteLeft,FaQuoteRight} from "react-icons/fa" function Testimonial({length,setTestimonial,testimonial}){ function backSliderHandler(){ let id = testimonial.id; } return(
{testimonial.name}
{testimonial.job}

{testimonial.text}

); } export default Testimonial;
